      • isBeingFollowed

        public boolean isBeingFollowed(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Function for testing if a specific Unit is already being followed by a Science_Vessel.
        Parameters:
        unit - the Unit that is tested / targeted.
        Returns:
        true if a Science_Vessel is following that specific Unit, false if not.

      • isFollowing

        public boolean isFollowing(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Function for testing if a Science_Vessel is following a Unit.
        Parameters:
        unit - the Science_Vessel that is tested.
        Returns:
        true if the Science_Vessel is following a Unit, false if not.

      • followUnit

        public boolean followUnit(bwapi.Unit vessel,
                          bwapi.Unit target)
        Function for assigning a Science_Vessel to follow another Unit.
        Parameters:
        vessel - the Science_Vessel that is going to follow the target Unit.
        target - the Unit that is going to be followed by the Science_Vessel.
        Returns:
        true if the assigning of the Science_Vessel to the target was a success and no other Unit was mapped to it.

      • unfollowUnit

        public void unfollowUnit(bwapi.Unit vessel)
        Function for removing a mapping of a Science_Vessel.
        Parameters:
        vessel - the Science_Vessel whose mapping to a target is going to be removed.

      • getFollowedUnit

        public bwapi.Unit getFollowedUnit(bwapi.Unit vessel)
        Function for retrieving the Unit that the provided Science_Vessel is currently following.
        Parameters:
        vessel - the Science_Vessel whose follow-target is requested.
        Returns:
        the Unit that the provided Science_Vessel is currently following or null, if the provided Unit is currently not following any.

      • getFollowingUnit

        public bwapi.Unit getFollowingUnit(bwapi.Unit followedUnit)
        Function for retrieving the Science_Vessel that is following the provided Unit.
        Parameters:
        followedUnit - the Unit whose Science_Vessel follower is being requested.
        Returns:
        the Science_Vessel that is following the provided Unit or null, if the Unit is not being followed by a Science_Vessel.
